name: OpenAI Agents
description: OpenAI provides models with agentic strengths, a toolkit for agent creation and deploys, and dashboard features for monitoring and optimizing agents.

name: LangChain
description: A framework for developing applications powered by language models. It offers modular components for building language model applications.

name: CrewAI
description: CrewAI provides a collaborative platform to build AI agents that work together and learn from each other.

name: AutoGen
description: AutoGen is a framework developed by Microsoft for building and managing AI agents that can work collaboratively.

name: Semantic Kernel
description: Semantic Kernel is a framework for integrating AI capabilities into applications using a kernel-based approach.

name: LlamaIndex
description: A framework for building applications that leverage large language models to improve user interactions.

name: SuperAGI
description: SuperAGI is a platform for building and deploying AI agents that can perform complex tasks autonomously.

name: Rasa
description: Rasa is an open-source machine learning framework to automate text- and voice-based assistants.

name: AgentFlow
description: AgentFlow is a framework dedicated to building conversational agents that can interact with users in real-time.

name: IBM Watson Assistant
description: Watson Assistant is an AI service that helps you build conversational interfaces into any application, device, or channel.

name: Anthropic's Claude
description: Claude is an AI assistant designed to help with various tasks within applications using natural language understanding.

name: Dialogflow
description: Dialogflow is a Google Cloud service that enables you to design and integrate a conversational user interface into mobile apps, web applications, devices, and bots.

name: Microsoft Bot Framework
description: The Microsoft Bot Framework is a comprehensive framework for building enterprise-grade conversational AI experiences.

name: Haystack
description: Haystack is an open-source framework for building search systems that can retrieve and answer questions using the latest NLP techniques.
